summary: This document is a Purchase and Sales Agreement between Richard Yospin, Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust, and Granite Reality LLC for a property located in Bradford, NH. It outlines the terms of sale, including the selling price, deposits, inspections, and contingencies related to the transaction.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is the seller of the property, acting as the Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust.

persons.name: Granite Reality LLC
persons.context: Granite Reality LLC is the buyer of the property as per the agreement.

persons.name: Marant Weathers
persons.context: Marant Weathers is identified as an agent of Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty involved in the transaction.

connections.description: Richard Yospin is selling the property to Granite Reality LLC as per the terms of the Purchase and Sales Agreement.
Marant Weathers represents Richard Yospin in the sale of the property.
Marant Weathers represents Granite Reality LLC in the purchase of the property.

events.title: Purchase and Sales Agreement Signed
events.description: The Purchase and Sales Agreement was signed between Richard Yospin and Granite Reality LLC for the property located in Bradford, NH.

keyFacts: The selling price of the property is $1,075,000.
An initial deposit of $10,000 is required, with an additional deposit of $90,000 due upon satisfactory inspection results.
The agreement includes contingencies for inspections and financing.
Marant Weathers is the agent representing both the seller and the buyer in this transaction.
